headline: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated
author: Lauren Frias
sentences: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
